item.title: Generating CA and certificates with CFSSL
item.description: Generating a CA and signing certificates with CFSSL About Background Recently I was trying to setup an example mutual TLS configuration between Prometheus (the server) and Node Exporter. In doing so I used OpenSSL to generate a CA and certificates for Prometheus and then have the Node exporter trust any client certificates signed by the CA.
